solution_line_template: From city A to city B, the bus carried {first_trip_fraction}*{bus_capacity} = <<{first_trip_fraction}*{bus_capacity}={first_trip_passengers}>>{first_trip_passengers} passengers
On the return trip, the bus carried {return_trip_fraction}*{bus_capacity} = <<{return_trip_fraction}*{bus_capacity}={return_trip_passengers}>>{return_trip_passengers} passengers
In total, the bus carried {return_trip_passengers}+{first_trip_passengers} = <<{return_trip_passengers}+{first_trip_passengers}={total_passengers}>>{total_passengers} passengers.
